Services.name: Balance confirmation
Services.text: Confirm closing balance with your business partners in one click.

Services.name: Reconciliation Dashboard
Services.text: All your AP and AR insights at one location.

Services.name: MSME status
Services.text: Unique platform to collect and validate the status of your vendors

Services.name: Ledger request
Services.text: Get ledgers from all of your business partners in one click.

Testimonials.text: The balance confirmation automation tool is a game-changer! It's made our reconciliation process faster and error-free. Highly recommended!
Testimonials.name: Ratan Singh, Finance Controller, Blackberrys

Testimonials.text: Automated vendor balance confirmation and reconciliation has significantly reduced our manpower costs and improved overall efficiency. Also, the customer support system we received was unparallel.
Testimonials.name: Sourabh Kumar, Finance Controller, Sansera Engineering

Testimonials.text: AI-ML Recon tool of NAKAD has increased our coverage. We are able to reconcile with more than 80% of our vendors which was earlier around 30%.
Testimonials.name: Vivek Bansal, Finance Controller, Ralson
